trans-unit.source: The LdapException class is an exception that occurs when LDAP returns an error code not included in <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode"></xref>.
The LdapException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException"></xref> class.
The LdapException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException"></xref> class using the specified error code.
The default message displayed to the client is "Communications error with the LDAP server".
The error code returned by the LDAP implementation.
The LdapException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException"></xref> class using the specified message.
The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
The LdapException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException"></xref> class using the specified error code and message.
The error code returned by the LDAP implementation.
The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
The LdapException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException"></xref> class using the specified serialization data and streaming context.
Data required to serialize the parameter.
The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the parameter.
The LdapException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException"></xref> class using the specified message and inner exception.
The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
The inner exception, if any, that threw the exception.
The LdapException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException"></xref> class using the specified error code, message, and inner exception.
The error code returned by the LDAP implementation.
The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
The inner exception, if any, that threw the exception.

The LdapException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException"></xref> class using the specified error code, message, and LDAP server error message.
The error code returned by the LDAP implementation.
The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
The LDAP server error message.
The ErrorCode property contains the LDAP error code.
The LDAP error code.
The GetObjectData method populates the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data required to serialize the parameter.
Data required to serialize the parameter.
The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the parameter.
The PartialResults property contains a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultsCollection"></xref> object that contains partial results.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultsCollection"></xref> object that contains partial results.
The ServerErrorMessage property contains a <xref:System.String> that contains the LDAP server error message (if any exists).
A <xref:System.String> that contains the LDAP server error message (if any).
